title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chandler Parsons on Kyrie’s Boston Salute, KD Greatness, Warriors Culture
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chandler Parsons on Kyrie’s Boston Salute, KD Greatness, Warriors Culture
description:
First, (3:00) Colin looks at why the NBA Playoff ratings have been higher than normal. Then, 9-year NBA veteran Chandler Parsons joins Colin to discuss the obstacles international players face (13:00),why the Warriors “Death Lineup” is so hard to stop (17:00), if Kyrie went over the line by flipping off Boston fans (25:00), what he learned playing for Billy Donovan (27:00), what makes KD an all-time player (37:00), why he’s not bitter over his career ending due to an accident with a drunk driver (39:00), when he realized he belonged in the NBA (44:00), and what makes the Warriors culture so special (46:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
